on-event-update-area.area-target: ${managementPaginationTarget}?contextManagement=${contextManagement}&screenNameListIndex=${screenNameListIndex}&folderIndex=${folderIndex}&relationTitle=${relationTitle}&entityName=${bsh: import org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilValidate; UtilValidate.isNotEmpty(context.get("reloadEntityName")) ? context.get("reloadEntityName") : context.get("entityName")}&parentEntityName=${parentEntityName}&detail=${parameters.detail}&managementFormType=${managementFormType}&subFolder=${subFolder}&${bsh: return org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilValidate.isNotEmpty(parameters.get("managementFormName")) ? "managementFormName="+parameters.get("managementFormName")+"&" : ""}managementScreenName=${managementScreenName}&managementScreenLocation=${managementScreenLocation}&searchFormLocation=${searchFormLocation}&searchFormResultLocation=${searchFormResultLocation}&advancedSearchFormLocation=${advancedSearchFormLocation}&contextManagementScreenName=${contextManagementScreenName}&contextManagementScreenLocation=${contextManagementScreenLocation}&childManagementFormListScreenName=${childManagementFormListScreenName}&childManagementFormListScreenLocation=${childManagementFormListScreenLocation}&contextManagementFormName=${contextManagementFormName}&contextManagementFormLocation=${contextManagementFormLocation}&childManagementFormListLocation=${childManagementFormListLocation}&childManagementDetailTitle=${childManagementDetailTitle}&backAreaId=${backAreaId}${bsh: import org.ofbiz.base.util.*; UtilValidate.isNotEmpty(context.get("managementChildExtraParams")) ? "&" + StringUtil.replaceString(context.get("managementChildExtraParams"),"|","&") : ""}&childManagement=${childManagement}${bsh: return org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilValidate.isNotEmpty(context.get("extraParams")) ? "&" + context.get("extraParams") : ""}${bsh: org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilValidate.isNotEmpty(context.get("orderBy")) ? "&orderBy=" + context.get("orderBy") : (org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilValidate.isNotEmpty(parameters.get("orderBy")) ? "&orderBy=" + parameters.get("orderBy") : "")}&oldManagementFormType=${parameters.oldManagementFormType}

display.description: ${bsh: import org.ofbiz.party.party.PartyHelper; import org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilValidate; UtilValidate.isNotEmpty(parameters.get("partyName")) ? parameters.get("partyName") : PartyHelper.getPartyName(delegator, partyId, true);}

${bsh: import org.ofbiz.party.party.PartyHelper; import org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilValidate; UtilValidate.isNotEmpty(parameters.get("partyName")) ? parameters.get("partyName") : PartyHelper.getPartyName(delegator, partyId, true);}

${bsh: import org.ofbiz.party.party.PartyHelper; import org.ofbiz.base.util.UtilValidate; UtilValidate.isNotEmpty(parameters.get("partyName")) ? parameters.get("partyName") : PartyHelper.getPartyName(delegator, partyId, true);}
